morning.title: Good morning
morning.content_1: â€œEither you run the day or the day runs youâ€
morning.content_2: â€œHave a happy and lucky new dayâ€
morning.content_3: â€œOpportunities don't happen, you create themâ€
morning.content_4: â€œThe leaves are green, my heart is red. Have a nice morningâ€
morning.content_5: â€œAbsolutely focus to have a productive dayâ€
morning.content_6: â€œWishing you a new day full of energy for a productive dayâ€
morning.content_7: â€œYour spirit is good today. Have a great working dayâ€
morning.content_8: â€œLearn as if you will live forever, live like you will die tomorrowâ€
morning.content_9: â€œI have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't workâ€
morning.content_10: â€œWorry is a misuse of imaginationâ€
morning.content_11: â€œI never look back, darling. It distracts from the nowâ€
morning.content_14: â€œWishing you a brilliant and happy morningâ€
morning.content_15: â€œA year from now you will wish you had started todayâ€
morning.content_16: â€œHope this message will bring you happiness and luck from my placeâ€
morning.content_17: â€œDon't let someone else's opinion of you become your realityâ€
morning.content_18: â€œHustle beats talent when talent doesnâ€™t hustleâ€
morning.content_19: â€œSet your goals high, and donâ€™t stop till you get thereâ€
morning.content_20: â€œI have stood on a mountain of noâ€™s for one yesâ€
morning.content_21: â€œInspiration does exist, but it must find you workingâ€
morning.content_22: â€œDonâ€™t let yesterday take up too much of todayâ€
morning.content_23: â€œIt is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitationâ€
morning.content_24: â€œTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you wayâ€
morning.content_25: â€œDon't wait. The time will never be just rightâ€
morning.content_27: â€œChange your thoughts and you change your worldâ€
morning.content_28: â€œEvery strike brings me closer to the next home runâ€
morning.content_29: â€œTalent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championshipsâ€
morning.content_30: â€œThe beginning is the most important part of the workâ€
morning.content_31: â€œWhen you like your work every day is a holidayâ€
morning.content_32: â€œDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happinessâ€
morning.content_33: â€œAs a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskeyâ€
morning.content_34: â€œIf you donâ€™t risk anything, you risk even moreâ€
morning.content_35: â€œCan anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begunâ€
morning.content_36: â€œSuccess is getting what you want, happiness is wanting what you getâ€
morning.content_37: â€œNo challenge shall never know all its capabilitiesâ€
morning.content_38: â€œSuccess is a journey not a destinationâ€

afternoon.title: Good afternoon
afternoon.content_1: â€œEither you run the day or the day runs youâ€

afternoon.content_3: â€œAbsolutely focus to have a productive dayâ€
afternoon.content_4: â€œHope this message will bring you happiness and luck from my placeâ€
afternoon.content_5: â€œSetting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visibleâ€
afternoon.content_7: â€œYour spirit is good today. Have a great working dayâ€
afternoon.content_8: â€œIt is never too late to be what you might have beenâ€
afternoon.content_9: â€œTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you wayâ€
afternoon.content_10: â€œIf youâ€™re not positive energy, youâ€™re negative energy.â€
afternoon.content_12: â€œChange your thoughts and you change your worldâ€
afternoon.content_13: â€œAlone we can do so little, together we can do so muchâ€
afternoon.content_14: â€œTalent wins games, but teamwork and intelligence win championshipsâ€
afternoon.content_15: â€œThe beginning is the most important part of the workâ€
afternoon.content_16: â€œWhen you like your work every day is a holidayâ€
afternoon.content_17: â€œDoing what you like is freedom. Liking what you do is happinessâ€
afternoon.content_18: â€œAs a cure for worrying, work is better than whiskeyâ€
afternoon.content_19: â€œYou donâ€™t have to see the whole staircase, just take the first stepâ€
afternoon.content_20: â€œCan anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begunâ€
afternoon.content_21: â€œWork until your bank account looks like a phone numberâ€
afternoon.content_22: â€œNo challenge shall never know all its capabilitiesâ€
afternoon.content_23: â€œSuccess is a journey not a destinationâ€

evening.title: Good evening
evening.content_1: â€œEither you run the day or the day runs youâ€

evening.content_3: â€œTry to take advantage of every opportunity that comes you wayâ€
